page.title: 16Recreation.Clubs.Events.
page.content: {Downton Band}has been going for many years. It used to be called Downton Silver Band but it is now called the Downton Huntsman Band. The band goes to contests in Southampton, Bristol, Poole and Weymouth. They have already played at the Royal Albert Hall in London and come 4th out of 95 bands. There is a Junior section in the band. Matthew Bowen, in our class, is in it; he plays the trombone. He says he is not sure whether he likes it or not. Altogether the Senior band has won 8 cups and 2 shields. The Band also plays at shows like the Bath and West, the Cuckoo Fair, the church Fete and the New Forest Show. They rehearse in the band hall near our school on Mondays and Wednesdays.
